params.description: params defines the 27-interchain-accounts/controller parameters to update. NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.title: Msg Update Params
MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams defines the payload for Msg/UpdateParams

controllerEnabled.description: controller_enabled enables or disables the controller submodule.

ibc.applications.interchainAccounts.cont.title: Params
ibc.applications.interchainAccounts.cont.description: Params defines the set of on-chain interchain accounts parameters. The following parameters may be used to disable the controller submodule.
